description: A collection of data merge image placeholders.

properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

methods.description: Creates a data merge image placeholder.

parameters.description: The page item on which to place the placeholder.
parameters.name: placeholder

parameters.description: The data merge field to insert.
parameters.name: field

parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new DataMergeImagePlaceholder (Optional)
parameters.name: withProperties

methods.name: add

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the DataMergeImagePlaceholder.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Returns the DataMergeImagePlaceholder with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the DataMergeImagePlaceholders within the specified range.

parameters.description: The DataMergeImagePlaceholder, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: DataMergeImagePlaceholder, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The DataMergeImagePlaceholder, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: DataMergeImagePlaceholder, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first DataMergeImagePlaceholder in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last DataMergeImagePlaceholder in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle DataMergeImagePlaceholder in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the DataMergeImagePlaceholder with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the DataMergeImagePlaceholder that follows the desired DataMergeImagePlaceholder.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the DataMergeImagePlaceholder whose index follows the specified DataMergeImagePlaceholder in the collection.

parameters.description: The DataMergeImagePlaceholder whose index comes before the desired DataMergeImagePlaceholder.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any DataMergeImagePlaceholder in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every DataMergeImagePlaceholder in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the DataMergeImagePlaceholder.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the DataMergeImagePlaceholder with the specified index.

name: DataMergeImagePlaceholders
